DataElement.preferredName: Patient Contact Future Research Result Consent Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to a patient's consent to be contacted to learn of the results from future research of laboratory studies using their specimen(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Contact Future Research Result Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a patient's consent to be contacted to learn of the results from future research of laboratory studies using their specimen(s).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: a channel for communication between groups:A time that is yet to come.:systematic investigation to establish facts.:class to hold instances used as the filler for the property has_result:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: a channel for communication between groups
A time that is yet to come.
class to hold instances used as the filler for the property has_result

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has agreed that his/h
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her study doctor (or their representative) may contact them or their physician to see if they would like to learn about the results from this(ese) study(ies).

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient agree to be in the Tracking Outcome part of the study and to collection of basic information about how they respond to treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient would like to be contacted by study investigators with a summary of results of the study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient agree to participate in the Tracking Outcome part of the study, allowing collection of basic information about how they are doing?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient agree to continued participation in the Tracking Outcome part of the study, allowing collection of basic information about how they are doing?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor or their representative may contact me or my physician to see if I wish to learn about results from  this(ese) study(ies).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or their representative, may contact me or my physician to see if I wish to learn about results from this study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Question Text - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant has given permission to contact him/her or his/her physician to learn about the results of these studies

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Question Text - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: The participant agreed that her study doctor, or their representative, may contact her physician to see if participant wishes to participate in other research in the future

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-text-3
ReferenceDocuments.description: The participant agreed that her study doctor, or their representative, may contact her, or her physician to see if she wishes to learn about results from the main research study

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-5
ReferenceDocuments.description: The participant agreed that her study doctor, or their representative, may contact her, or her physician to see if she wishes to learn about results from this(ese) study(ies)

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant provide permission to their study doctor, or their representatives, to contact them once the entire study has been completed for the purposes of sending study results when they become available?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant agree that their study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact them or their doctor to see if they wish to learn about results from this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant agree that their study doctor, or their representative, may contact them or their physician to see if they wish to learn about results from this(ese) study(ies)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree that their study doctor, or their representative, may contact them to see if they wish to  learn the results of this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree that their study doctor, or their representative, may contact them or their doctor to see if they wish to  learn the results of this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-10
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about the results of this study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about results from this study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance - A211801
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that her study doctor (or their representative) may contact her or their physician to see if they wish to participate in future research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-12
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about results from these studies.
